title: Kawhi Leonard, Patrick Mahomes, young QBs, Tom Brady, and the Lakers
itunes:title: Kawhi Leonard, Patrick Mahomes, young QBs, Tom Brady, and the Lakers
description:
Colin discusses why he feels Toronto Raptors F Kawhi Leonard is overrated, how the media is soft on Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes, the play of some of the younger QBs in the league, Warren Moon's comments on New England Patriots QB Tom Brady, and why the rumors of the Los Angeles Lakers unhappy with HC Luke Walton are ridiculous. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Greg Cosell, Greg Jennings, and Seth Joyner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
